title: Spider Monkey's Question
description: Tari the Spider Monkey was born asking questions about everything. One day he asks a question only the Namer can answer. Tari and his friend Balam Iguana travel to the other world beyond the forest to ask the Namer how she thought of their names. Illustrations support the text.
meta: canopy, generation, landscape, mysteries, permission, resemble
